title: Welcome!
content_html: Welcome to the new and improved sharkmandan.com! Nearly all the blog-posts entered on this site will be programming related. I may still cross-post a few things to medium, or add non-programming posts to both medium and sharkmandan.com. For the historical medium posts, see the section to the right/bottom (responsive woo!).
